description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Clam Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Coconut Clam Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs fresh ginger root, finely chopped
3 large red chilies, split in half lengthwise
2 limes, finely grated zest and juice

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a nonstick wok or large saucepan over a high heat and then add the oil. Stir in the garlic, ginger, red chilies, and scallions. Stir-fry for 30 seconds and then add the coconut milk, lemongrass, soy sauce, lime zest and juice, and sugar. Bring to a boil then add the clams.
Bring back to a boil, cover, and cook briskly for 3-5 minutes or until all the clams have opened. Discard any that remain closed.
Remove from the heat, stir in the coriander, and season well. Ladle into warmed bowls and serve immediately with a spoon for the juices.
